about.description_1: Professional programmer with extensive practical experience in the design, development and support of sites, portals, complex projects.
about.description_2: Voluminous / long-term and promising web projects are interesting, the ideal option is with weekly payment on a long-term basis.
about.description_3: The priority is individual custom development, voluminous, atypical, lengthy projects with support: original corporate sites, online stores, CRM, portals, startups, integrations, databases.
